title: Which guitarists usually play with a Fender Stratocaster? - Quora

response.answer_text: Too many to even list. A very brief list would include Eric Clapton and David Gilmore. Robert Cray, Steve Miller, Buddy Holly, Yngway Malsttem (sp?), Ritchie Blackmore, Mark Knoffler …. The Strat has been manufactured continuously since it was introduced, in the 1950’s. The list of famous guitarists who have used them would probably take years to list. You can try to figure out some for yourself. Strats have a unique ‘chimney’ quality that gives them, and some Strat clones, a unique, distinctive sound. If you listen to the guitar sound on ‘Sultans of Swing’ by Dire Straits, you’ll hear what I’m talking about,

Jimi Hendrix Eric Clapton Dave Murray Dave Gilmour John Frusciante Kurt Cobain Jeff Beck Ritchie Blackmore Buddy Holly Eric Johnson Mark Knopfler Hank Marvin Stevie Ray Vaughan Those are just a few, there's probably way more.
